overview:
Krian Upatkoon is co-founder and CIO at GoMakan.com, a fast-growing food portal that aims to become the definitive authority on restaurants in Malaysia. He has a MSE in Computer Engineering from the University of Michigan.

Krian has lived in and out of Michigan for over fifteen years, and has spent several years at Internet TV startup Zattoo. During his time in college, Krian co-authored M.U.G.E.N, a fighting game engine that became a cult hit among early UGC communities.

Krian returned to Malaysia in 2010, and was appalled at how undeveloped the Internet was there. Along with GoMakan co-founders Shin Kajiwara and Ivevei Upatkoon, Krian decided to stop complaining and start building.
